title: 1 BEDROOM 1 BATH TOWNHOUSE FOR RENT
posting_body: Hello my name is Beth, I am the onsite manager for The Reed Oaks Apartments.
Located minutes from the heart of downtown San Jose.

Just blocks away from the center of Downtown San Jose, light rails, grocery stores, farmers markets, nightlife, movie theaters & world-famous restaurants where driving & parking become a thing of the past.
The Reed Oaks Apartments are professionally managed by Prodesse Property Group.
Please reach out to setup a tour
If you are unable to view in person or want a sneak peek Check out the virtual tour: Video-    <URL>
*Private enclosed patio, opening from the living room area
*Private terrace nook, opening from the dining room area
*New kitchen granite counter tops and floors
*Applicants must have a combined gross monthly income equal to, or greater than, 2.75 % times the monthly
*Must have verifiable income such as (Pay Stubs, Grants or Scholarships, Unemployment, Etc.)
*On -Site Credit Screening Service is used to process all applicants over 18 years of age together for a combined
We are a dedicated team of property management professionals working together to manage residential properties throughout the San Francisco Bay Area.
We take great pride in creating wonderful living spaces that feel like home.
Professionally managed by Prodesse Property Group LLC
